## UseExtensionsConfig.updateOn property

Sets when re-render is triggered on extension load.

**Signature:**

```typescript
updateOn?: "each" | "all";
```

## Remarks

Set to `each` to trigger a component re-render every time an individual extension loads, which may result in multiple UI updates. Set to `all` to wait until all extensions have loaded to re-render the component.
